snippet: The Church of Scientology’s commercial, alongside pitches for Budweiser, Coca-Cola and Mercedes-Benz, came in the wake of criticism of treatment of church members.
abstract: Church of Scientology airs Super Bowl commercial in an effort to soften its message following months of mounting accusations over the treatment of its members.

byline.original: By TANZINA VEGA and MICHAEL CIEPLY

lead_paragraph: The Church of Scientology’s commercial, alongside pitches for Budweiser, Coca-Cola and Mercedes-Benz, came in the wake of criticism of treatment of church members.

headline.main: With a Super Bowl Ad, Scientology Gets a Crowd
